mapper.insert: insert into spm_cart(memberMail, goodId, goodCount) values(#{memberMail}, #{goodId}, #{goodCount})
mapper.select: select a.cartId, a.memberMail, a.goodId, a.goodCount, b.goodName, b.goodPrice, b.goodDiscount from spm_cart a left join spm_good b on a.goodId = b.goodId where memberMail = #{memberMail} order by a.cartId desc
